column4: look in dmesg and see if b43 is complaining about not being able to find it's firmware
and before resorting to ndiswrapper you could try bcmwl-kernel-source
I have only been using linux for a week, not familiar with dmesg
oic, open a terminal (Applications -> Accessories -> Terminal) or with the unity search, type dmesg in there, pretty self explainitory, if you feel the need, paste to paste.ubuntu.com
